header_text: Your friend invites you to a dinner party and after you leave, they casually mention that one of the people there had been sick. You can’t believe your friend wouldn’t tell you this before the party ended. You decide to talk to your friend about it, and they say they will communicate better.

elements.Text: Did your friend put you in a dangerous situation on purpose?

elements.name: Your friend invites you to a dinner party and after you leave, they casually mention that one of the people there had been sick. You can’t believe your friend wouldn’t tell you this before the party ended. You decide to talk to your friend about it, and they say they will communicate better._Physical Health_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
